data.title: Tempe Union High School District
data.meta_description: Tempe Union High School District - Excellence in Teaching and Learning, serves Tempe, Arizona which includes some areas in the city of Chandler and west of the Loop 101 and Guadalupe.
data.text:
OUR VISION:

Excellence in Teaching and Learning

“Connect, Innovate, Thrive, Lead”

OUR MISSION:

We put students first by providing an inclusive, future-focused, and collaborative learning environment that promotes safety, academic success, and personal growth.

Public Meeting Notices | Governing Board meetings will be held in the Governing Board Room of the Benedict Education Center: 500 W. Guadalupe Rd. Tempe, AZ 85283.

Meetings are open to the public. Seating capacity is limited and available on a first-come, first-served basis. The Governing Board meetings will also be live-streamed on the District YouTube channel.

Next Regular Governing Board Meeting: August 7, 2024 | 7 PM

Long-Term Budget Planning Committee Meeting: July 30, 2024 | 6:30 PM | Held at TUHSD's 490 W. Guadalupe Rd. Tempe, AZ | Cafeteria.

Agendas & Minutes

Please download interactive pdfs to your desktop and fill them out in Adobe Reader. Download the current version of Adobe Reader to enable the save as feature. Filling out a form in an internet browser window will NOT save your content. Word documents will download to your desktop to be opened in a Microsoft Word application to enable the save as feature.
